word_mean_info__list.difference: 指某物很大，大得惊人；也可用作引申意义。
侧重尺寸、规模和体积的无比巨大。
含义广，强调体积或容积的庞大。也可用于引申意义。
指面积或体积的巨大，但多用于引申意义。
指大的体积、数量和重量，侧重庞大而笨重。
多指空间、面积、范围的巨大，不涉及重量。
指体积、数量或程度远远超过一般标准。
正式用词，侧重空间的广阔，也指面积或分量的巨大。
非正式用词，多为褒义。指如巨人般的庞大体积。

word_group.brief_definition: 大规模投资；庞大的投资

bilingual.source: Irniq watched the massive shadow weave its way under the thick ice.
bilingual.target: 伊尔尼克看着巨大的影子在厚厚的冰下穿行。

bilingual.source: The sun is a massive celestial body.
bilingual.target: 太阳是一个巨大的天体。

bilingual.source: He lifted the massive box with ease.
bilingual.target: 他轻松地举起了那个巨大的箱子。

bilingual.source: The galaxy is a massive system of stars.
bilingual.target: 银河系是一个巨大的恒星系统。

bilingual.source: The orc carried a massive axe into battle.
bilingual.target: 兽人带着一把巨大的斧头上战场。

bilingual.source: The museum has a display of a massive antler.
bilingual.target: 博物馆有一个巨大的鹿角展览。

bilingual.source: The Titan lifted the massive boulder with ease.
bilingual.target: 这个巨人轻松地举起了巨大的石头。

bilingual.source: The earthquake caused massive damage to the city.
bilingual.target: 地震对城市造成了巨大的破坏。
核爆炸造成了巨大的破坏。

bilingual.source: The city of Troy was famous for its massive walls.
bilingual.target: 特洛伊城以其巨大的城墙而闻名。

list.abstract: Massive Attack（大举进攻）来自英国布里斯托乐队，活跃于20世纪90年代。Massive Attack被称为Trip-pop界三巨头之一的乐队，他们代表的更是一种高水准的音乐创作，他们往往不惜花费数年时间来潜心制作而使一张专辑达到完美的顶峰。2016年2月，Massive Attack宣布携最新EP Ritual Spirit正式回归乐坛，在EP宣布的同时，首支单曲“Take It There”也同步公开。
Massive仿真系统，由《指环王》电影诞生且成名，独具特色的视觉效果和自治角色动画软件系统工具，广泛应用于影视制作。是维塔数字的核心技术之一。

yingyinNormal.en: The massive wheel is over 400 feet high, and takes 30 minutes to complete one rotation.
yingyinNormal.zh: 巨大的摩天轮超过 400 呎高，在转一圈需时30分钟。

yingyinNormal.en: To feed this hunger for entertainment that was denied to them for decades, south of Shanghai in Zhejiang province, a massive complex has been built.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为满足人们对娱乐数十年来从未被满足的渴望，在上海之南的浙江省，一个巨大的综合设施早已拔地而起。

yingyinNormal.en: In outer space, you can get so much mass together, like in a super-massive star that the gravity just becomes stronger and stronger and stronger, and eventually the pressure that matter exerts on itself can't keep up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在外太空，你可以聚起非常多的质量，就像在一个超级巨大的恒星引力就会变得越来越大，越来越大，最终物质对自身施加的压力无法承受。

yingyinNormal.en: So is a massive army of octopi.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一大批章鱼军队也在那儿！

yingyinNormal.en: They wind up unemployable and saddled with massive debt.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们最终无法就业并且还背上了高额的贷款。

yingyinNormal.en: Overconfidence from his robot's massive size and its overwhelming power.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他对机器人大体积超能量的过度自信。

yingyinNormal.en: This is my first day. Nate! A massive video camera also aids the situation.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是我第一天上班。内特！现场还有个大摄像机录着像。

yingyinNormal.en: He'll have enough to build a massive army and annihilate your species forever.
yingyinNormal.zh: 让他有足够原料组织新的大军，人类会永远灭绝。

yingyinNormal.en: Penny, this would be a massive undertaking, and my time is both limited and valuable.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩妮，教你可是艰巨的任务，我的时间既有限又宝贵呢。

yingyinNormal.en: Cervical fracture, massive hematoma. No guests or hosts in the vicinity when it occurred.
yingyinNormal.zh: 颈椎骨折，大面积血肿，事情发生的时候，附近没有游客或接待员。

yingyinNormal.en: So, this is like a massive, fiery fondue. It looks so good, I've got to taste some of it now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这像是又大又辣的奶酪火锅，令人食指大动，我现在就要尝尝。

yingyinNormal.en: Flying above the Amazon, you can see how massive it is. I'm told it's almost the size of Australia.
yingyinNormal.zh: 飞越亚马逊丛林上空，你可以领略到它的广阔，据说它几乎有澳大利亚那么大。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《大卫·贝克汉姆：探索未知之境》

yingyinNormal.en: It's massive and it's just getting geared up for the New Year's Eve celebrations. Shall we go? Yeah!
yingyinNormal.zh: 它的规模庞大，现在才刚刚准备开始，迎接除夕庆典。我们可以出发了？是的。

yingyinNormal.en: There were armed men in the basement of the exchange, a massive firefight six stories underground. Sameen was shot.
yingyinNormal.zh: 交易所的地下室设有重兵，负六层一场激战，萨姆恩中弹。

yingyinNormal.en: The kickback from a gun with this calibre would be massive. No cuts, no scarring. It's not Nathan, then. Who's next?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这种口径枪的后坐力会很强。没有伤口，没有伤疤。不是内森，下一个是谁？

yingyinNormal.en: The seven massive jumbotrons? What about these beers? Keeping them cold, enough refrigerators to chill 200,000 drinks.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还有那超大的屏幕，还有这些啤酒，它们都要进行冷藏，冷冻柜足够冷却20万人喝的饮料。

yingyinNormal.en: Here's my counter. No proceeds for the book, no alimony, massive reduction in child support, or you can get the hell out of here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的回应是不，准再问有关书的内容，没有赡养费，小孩抚养费要大幅减少，不同意的话，你们就可以滚出这里了。

yingyinNormal.en: But I will have to be convinced that there is a reason for massive social networking companies not to carry their own weight. Thank you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是必须要说服我，大量的社交网络公司不交税是有理由的，谢谢。

yingyinNormal.en: They're one of the two companies that makes these massive whole genome sequencing tools. And so what he did was he got his kids sequenced.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这家公司是提供基因组测序设备的两大供应商之一，所以他测定他的孩子的基因。

yingyinNormal.en: Let's go to the press, man! This is a massive story. Who wouldn't publish it? Robert Redford! No, you don't understand! I got it, guys. I got it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们去找媒体吧，兄弟！这么好的故事谁不想登啊？罗伯特·雷德福德！不，你不懂！我明白了，同志们，我明白了。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: containing a great quantity of matter

examination_example.sentence: It was a drop in the ocean compared with their <highlight>massive</highlight> financial reserves.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与他们庞大的财政储备相比，这只是沧海一粟。

examination_example.sentence: They attract <highlight>massive</highlight> attention precisely because they remain the exception to the rule.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们吸引了大量的关注，正是因为它们仍然是规则的例外。

examination_example.sentence: It must rely on low-wage overseas labor, order in volumes that strain natural resources, and use <highlight>massive</highlight> amounts of harmful chemicals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它必须依靠廉价的海外劳动力，大批量订货以致过度消耗自然资源，还有使用大量的有害化学物质。

sense_info_list.en: imposing in scale or scope or degree or power

examination_example.sentence: AT&T is often given as the gold standard of a company who decided to do a <highlight>massive</highlight> reskilling program.
examination_example.sentence_trans: AT&T经常被认为是决定进行大规模再培训的公司的黄金标准。

examination_example.sentence: Although electric cars are still a rarity on roads now, this <highlight>massive</highlight> investment could change the picture rapidly in coming years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管电动汽车目前在道路上仍然很少见，但这一大规模投资可能会在未来几年迅速改变这一局面。

examination_example.sentence: Authorities are recommending people catch a domestic flight in advance, at least at some major u.s. airports with increasingly <highlight>massive</highlight> security lines.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当局建议人们提前搭乘国内航班，至少在一些安检队伍越来越大的美国主要机场是这样。

sense_info_list.en: imposing in size or bulk or solidity

数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 团；块；堆；大多数；主要部分；质量；（Mass）弥撒

sense_info_list.en: containing a great quantity of matter

examination_example.sentence: Give the right computer a <highlight>massive</highlight> database of faces, and it can process what it sees--then recognize a face it's told to find.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一台适合的计算机拥有一个庞大的人脸数据库，它能够处理所看到的东西，从而识别出要找的脸孔。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Massive</highlight> rubbish dumps and sprawling landfills constitute one of the more uncomfortable impacts that humans have on wildlife.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大量的垃圾场和不断扩张的垃圾填埋场是人类对野生动物造成的最令人不安的影响之一。

sense_info_list.en: imposing in scale or scope or degree or power

examination_example.sentence: One impetus for the policy is that companies are already starting to build <highlight>massive</highlight> constellations (星座).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该政策的一个推动力是，公司已经开始建立大规模的星座。

examination_example.sentence: The extreme isolation of these <highlight>massive</highlight> farms leaves them often unattended, and monitored only once or twice a year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些大型农场与人隔绝，往往无人看管，每年只监测一两次。

examination_example.sentence: For many of the researchers who'd like to design systems to address these challenges, <highlight>massive</highlight> database for experimentation just don't exist.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于希望能设计系统来解决这些难题的研究者来说，他们面对的问题是能够用来实验的大型数据集根本不存在。

sense_info_list.en: imposing in size or bulk or solidity

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 侧重尺寸、规模和体积或总量极大。
非正式用词, 多为褒义。指如巨人般的庞大体积。只作定语, 指比其他同类事物大。
指面积或体积的巨大, 但多用于引申意义。指规格、数量或程度巨大的, 含超出常规或预想之意。
含义广, 强调体积或容积的庞大, 但通常不用于重量, 也可用于引申意义。
正式用词, 侧重空间的广阔, 也指面积或分量的巨大。指体积、数量或程度等超过一搬标准的。
指大的体积、数量和重量, 侧重庞大而笨重。

精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 大而重的；厚重的；大块的；大量的；大规模的；均匀构造的；严重的；剧烈的；特别成功的；非常有影响的

word_family.mean: n. 团；块；堆；大多数；主要部分；质量；（Mass）弥撒

sense_info_list.en: containing a great quantity of matter

examination_example.sentence: They enable people to undertake <highlight>massive</highlight> tasks.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们使人们能够承担大量的任务。

examination_example.sentence: And those <highlight>massive</highlight> amounts of particles cart cause clouds to form.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些大量的粒子导致云层的形成。

examination_example.sentence: By picking up patterns from <highlight>massive</highlight> data on human behavior.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通过从大量的人类行为数据中提取模式。

sense_info_list.en: imposing in size or bulk or solidity

examination_example.sentence: As the global economy continues to be disrupted by technology and other <highlight>massive</highlight> change, the gig economy will become an engine of transformation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着全球经济继续受到技术和其他巨大变化的干扰，零工经济将成为转型的引擎。

examination_example.sentence: There is a <highlight>massive</highlight> difference between being lonely and being alone.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 孤独和独自之间有着很大区别。

examination_example.sentence: Their <highlight>massive</highlight> wake creates waves at the bottom of the sea, weakening the foundations of the centuries-old buildings themselves.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们巨大的尾流在海底激起波浪，削弱了这些古老建筑本身的地基。

sense_info_list.en: imposing in scale or scope or degree or power

examination_example.sentence: In a 2011 USPS case study, the agency emphasized its <highlight>massive</highlight> infrastructure as a "unique federal asset" to be called upon in a disaster or terrorist attack.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在2011年美国邮政的一份案例研究中，该机构强调其庞大的基础设施是在灾难或恐怖袭击中需要调用的一份“独特的联邦资产。”

examination_example.sentence: The idea, as he has put it, is to offer businesses "rapid, long-distance connectivity on a <highlight>massive</highlight> scale. "
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如其所言，这样做的目的是让各商业机构能“大规模地进行高速地远程连接”。

examination_example.sentence: The companies developing self-driving vehicles should be partnering with state and federal authorities to offer retraining for this <highlight>massive</highlight> workforce, many of whom will be displaced by the new technology.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 开发自动驾驶车辆的公司应该与州和联邦当局合作，为这一庞大的劳动力提供再培训，其中，许多人将被新技术取代。

examination_example.sentence: Ebike riders get the enjoyable part of cycling without the <highlight>massive</highlight> suffering of climbing huge hills.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 电动自行车的骑手可以享受骑车的乐趣，而且不用忍受爬山的巨大痛苦。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 侧重尺寸、规模和体积或总量极大。
非正式用词，多为褒义。指如巨人般的庞大体积。只作定语，指比其他同类事物大。
指面积或体积的巨大，但多用于引申意义。指规格、数量或程度巨大的，含超出常规或预想之意。
含义广，强调体积或容积的庞大，但通常不用于重量，也可用于引申意义。
正式用词，侧重空间的广阔，也指面积或分量的巨大。指体积、数量或程度等超过一搬标准的。
指大的体积、数量和重量，侧重庞大而笨重。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。
